sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.TableHelper</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>TableHelper</name> <script><![CDATA[var TableHelper = { getSysIdByName: function(name) { var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object'); gr.get('name', name); return gr.sys_id.toString(); } };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-05 22:55:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3b8485be0b1023009002cab937673a04</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>TableHelper</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Decision Tables" source="com.glide.decision_table">d304854b6da620100acb70b3534330ff</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3b8485be0b1023009002cab937673a04</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-05 23:35:06</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>159</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
